lead_paragraph: UBAKIVI--Dr. Mary R.,94, passed away peacefully at her residence in Manhattan on June 15, 2016. In 1945, at the age of 24, she fled Estonia alone during a period of great political turmoil, to Germany. She immigrated to the US in 1950. A professor at NYU Dental School, she was the only female instructor during her tenure there. She had a successful private practice in Manhattan and was a member of The American Dental Association. Mary was a vivacious, glamorous and independent woman who enjoyed travel and explored the world. She will be greatly missed by all who knew her. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  UBAKIVI, DR. MARY R.

Mary was a vivacious, glamorous and independent woman who enjoyed travel and explored the world. She will be greatly missed by all who knew her. 1/3
